types.refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature [PATCH]
types.style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc) [PATCH]
types.test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing ones [PATCH]
types.ci: Changes to your CI configuration files and scripts [PATCH]
types.BREAKING_CHANGE: An breaking change that previous versions do not support [MAJOR]
types.chore: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools and libraries such as documentation generation

type-empty: ⛔ ERRO: O tipo do commit não pode estar vazio. Escolha um tipo válido conforme as diretrizes.
